https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oOD3P5OGwR782HvFZQfhzqny3Le.jpg On the night of their high school graduation, three juvenile delinquents get drunk at their regular hangout. But for these boys about to enter a new chapter of life, they decide to share their darkest secrets with one another. The first secret is shocking. The second secret is terrifying. The third secret is... Wait! Unless you want us to kill you, you must do something terrible enough! Right now! Tonight! Bad Education
